mapper.delete:
delete from chat_msg where id in
#{id}

select.if: select chat_msg.text as text,chat_msg.timestamp as timestamp, chat_msg.type as type,friend.friend_id as object_id,user.avatar as avatar, friend.friend_note as nick from chat_msg,user,friend where chat_msg.type=0 and chat_msg.object_id=#{objectId} and friend.user_id=#{userId} and friend.friend_id=#{objectId} and friend.friend_id=user.id order by chat_msg.timestamp DESC limit 1

select chat_msg.text as text,chat_msg.timestamp as timestamp, chat_msg.type as type,'group'.id as object_id,'group'.avatar as avatar, 'group'.nick as nick from chat_msg,user,'group',group_user where chat_msg.type=1 and chat_msg.object_id=#{objectId} and group_user.user_id=#{userId} and group_user.group_id=#{objectId} order by chat_msg.timestamp DESC limit 1

select chat_msg.text as text,chat_msg.timestamp as timestamp, chat_msg.type as type,channel.id as object_id,channel.avatar as avatar, channel.nick as nick from chat_msg,user,channel,channel_user where chat_msg.type=1 and chat_msg.object_id=#{objectId} and channel_user.user_id=#{userId} and channel_user.channel_id=#{objectId} order by chat_msg.timestamp DESC limit 1
